Whoa! That was awesome. 90 attendees’ which includes Mozilla Reps, Student Reps, g33ks, entrepreneurs, students, media, friends at the Flicks party. The party began at 1700 Hrs in the evening with a bang by showing the ‘About Mozilla’ video. Followed by the Firefox Flicks intro and the Flicks showreel video.


We had our special guest, Anahita Gottipati. She’s sweet enough to share about her Flicks experience and interest in filmmaking.



Audience enjoyed watching all the winning videos of the Flicks contest that were screened at the venue and the night kicked-off with a healthy dose of food, drinking (vendor News Cafe), music and mingling. ;)

Oh! The fun moment was when the audience were playing ‘dumb charades’ guessing the movie names. The winners were given the Mozilla swag (who doesn’t like Mozilla swag?) ;)

Check out the article published about Firefox Flicks Contest and Anahita in ‘The Hindu’, the leading national newspaper.

Mozilla Reps and Student Reps at the event were Sai Kiran, Srikar Ananthula, Santosh Kesiraju, Kartheek, Aloke Anand to name a few.

We had an amazing time meeting at the event and watching the winning videos. Thanks to all for coming over and making the event a success.

Visit our Facebook Gallery for the awesome pictures of the event. Make sure to tag yourself and anyone you know in the photos!
